meanings.definition: Not limited to or associated with a particular religious denomination.
meanings.sent1: The school welcomed students of all faiths with its nonsectarian approach.
meanings.sent2: The nonsectarian event was attended by people from various religious backgrounds.
meanings.sent3: The nonsectarian picnic had everyone laughing and enjoying the day together.
meanings.sent4: Her nonsectarian viewpoint on spirituality opened up new perspectives for many.
meanings.sent5: The nonsectarian charity aimed to help those in need regardless of their beliefs.

meanings.definition: Not involving or relating to a specific sect or religious group.
meanings.sent1: The nonsectarian organization provided aid without any bias towards a particular group.
meanings.sent2: His nonsectarian beliefs promoted unity among people of different faiths.
meanings.sent3: The nonsectarian debate club welcomed members from all backgrounds.
meanings.sent4: The nonsectarian approach to decision-making ensured fairness for all involved.
meanings.sent5: The nonsectarian policy aimed to treat everyone equally, regardless of their religious affiliation.
